This is GLADE @glade_version@ for GNAT @gnat_version@.

GLADE is copyrighted by the Free Software Fundation and is maintained
by Ada Core Technologies (http://www.gnat.com/) and ACT Europe
(http://www.act-europe.fr/).

When reporting a bug report (to glade-report@gnat.com), please enclose
the following information at the beginning of your report unchanged
(including the [...] lines), this will help us keep track of the exact
files you got and ensure a prompt answer:

[DEVELOPMENT VERSION]
(do not add anything after the above line since it will be stripped by 
the packaging tool)
